duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise quality assurance during construction of PV infrastructure
Conduct project quality assurance audits, inspections, and reporting
Perform electrical testing, troubleshooting, component repair and replacement duties
Manage project acquisition construction and coordinate the Asset Management handover
Review and provide feedback during the drawing review process
Identify and document faults, non-conforming construction, safety violations etc. during field visits
Interact and communicate effectively with subcontractors and construction managers daily
Participate as a Subject Matter Expert during commissioning and witness testing
Perform repairs, troubleshooting, and corrective actions as required
Share experience and best practices to continuously improve the design, construction, and closeout processes

education_certification.credential: Professional licenses in trade (i.e. Electrical License, CSL, NABCEP PV, etc.)
Understanding of medium voltage systems and equipment
